item.description:

@echo off
cls
echo Voule Auto restart
tskill java /a
echo Restarting server
title EvolutionX.
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

item.title: Portforwarding [REWARDED]
item.dc:creator: @mark033 mark033
item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

[quote=“jaspertjeoo, post:6, topic:390482”][quote author=mark033 link=topic=486394.msg3564357#msg3564357 date=1302533384]
You keep asking how to portforward and every single time no-one here can be bothered to help you. Take a hint and go somewhere else for portforwarding help.
[/quote]
cuz i always get fucking retarded replys like that
and yes ive tryed to put my fire wall of…it didnt make any diffrence[/quote]

There are lots of port-forwarding tutorials and guides all over the interwebs, and people on Moparscape aren’t helping you. All I’m saying is that it seems like a waste of time continually asking here.

Look at excited’s link, then if that doesn’t work check this:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442058.0.html

And if that doesn’t work, sorry, and good luck.

Read full topic
